Entries.{{ModId}}_HelpOut/SawEvent 4/Weather rai:
jaunty/36 7/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Caroline 37 5 0 Pierre 39 8 1 Abigail 24 14 1/skippable/pause 2000/
                --Start/
                speak Caroline "I'm thinking of making some stew tonight. What do you think honey?"/pause 500/
                speak Pierre "Sure, whatever you'd like. You're fantastic at making stew.$1"/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "...$2#$b#Hm... I could use a bit of help making dinner tonight."/pause 500/
                speak Pierre "It'll be the perfect time for you and Abigail to bond with each other. Let me call her over here."/pause 500/move Pierre 0 1 3/move Pierre -2 0 3/
                speak Pierre "Abigail, come help your mother with making dinner, please!"/move Abigail 6 0 0/move Abigail 0 -1 1/move Abigail 1 0 0/move Abigail 0 -5 1/
                speak Caroline "...$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Caroline 2/emote Caroline 12/jump Caroline 8/pause 500/shake Caroline 1000/pause 1500/
                speak Caroline "I was hoping you'd be the one to help me out tonight, Pierre.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Pierre 0/pause 500/
                speak Pierre "Woah, take it easy sweetie. There's no need to go jumping around.$4#$b#I can help make dinner, it's not a big deal.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Abigail "You know, I can come back later-$2"/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "I just wish you'd help me out more on your own for once instead of me needing to ask you directly.$3#$b#You always push helping with dinner on to Abigail, but I want to spend some time with you too, Pierre.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Abigail "I'm just gonna head out...$2"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 5 3/move Abigail -1 0 2/move Abigail 0 1 3/move Abigail -6 0 2/
                speak Pierre "Look, I'm sorry, I didn't know you felt that way about me helping out.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "I really don't think I should have to ask.$3"/pause 500/
                speak Pierre "... You're right, I'm sorry Caroline. I hate seeing you upset like this.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "... I'm sorry for being so harsh. I just would like it if you would try to help out more and spend some more time with me.$2#$b#After all, you spend so much time focusing on the shop. I want my husband to still be there for me."/pause 500/
                speak Pierre "It's no problem, we can spend more time together. I promise I'll do better."/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "*mutters* Like I haven't heard that before.$2"/pause 500/move Pierre 1 0 0/move Pierre 0 -4 3/
                speak Pierre "Come on, let's go ahead and start making dinner together. I'll work on rinsing the vegetables."/pause 500/
                speak Caroline "...$2#$b#... Thanks honey, I appreciate it."/pause 500/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/faceDirection Caroline 0/emote Pierre 28 true/emote Caroline 32/pause 500/
                --End with dialogue/end dialogue Abigail "My parents are arguing again. It's awkward being in the same room as them when it happens.$2" dialogue Pierre "I spend plenty of time with her. I don't see why she's being so defensive.$2#$b#Oh, sorry, I didn't mean to say that out loud.$4" dialogue Caroline "I wish he would be more understanding of my needs sometimes...$2#$b#Oh, sorry. I got lost in thought for a moment there."

Entries.{{ModId}}_BrotherBanter/Weather rainy/Fr:
jaunty/18 15/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Vincent 12 15 0 Sam 21 13 2/skippable/pause 2000/
                --Start/
                speak Vincent "Sam!"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "Saaam..."/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "...$2"/pause 1500/
                speak Vincent "Saaaaaaam..."/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "...$5"/pause 1500/
                speak Vincent "Saaaaaaaaaaaam!$1"/pause 500/move Sam -9 0 2/move Sam 0 1 2/pause 500/doAction 12 14/pause 500/
                speak Sam "What do you want Vincent? I was sleeping still.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "I wanted to play with you.$1#$b#It's also after noon, so you should be wide awake now, right?"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Well... I technically was already awake...$2#$b#What did you wanna play?"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "I wanna color with you!$1"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "... Does coloring count as playing?$2"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "So did you wanna color with me?"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Why not? Give me time to eat breakfast first, though. I just got up."/pause 500/jump Vincent 8/pause 300/
                speak Vincent "Yay, I get to play with you!"/pause 500/move Vincent -5 0 0/move Vincent 0 -9 1/move Vincent 1 0 3/
                speak Sam "I guess I have to get up now, don't I?$2#$b#Oh well, I needed to get up anyways.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 1/pause 500/
                speak Sam "I hope he has some good coloring pages to choose from."/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "Come on Sam!$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/
                speak Sam "I'm coming, hold your horses!$1"/pause 500/
                end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Innocence/Weather sunny/Friend:
jaunty/39 11/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Vincent 41 11 2 Jas 38 11 2/skippable/showFrame Jas 22/showFrame Vincent 24/pause 3000/
                --Start/
                speak Vincent "So Jas, why do you like reading chapter books?$3"/pause 500/
                speak Jas "I like chapter books because there's more of a story to read!$1#$b#How come you like reading comic books?$3"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "I like comic books because the pictures make it easier for me to see what I'm reading.$1#$b#Miss Penny wants me to try reading more chapter books. They're so hard for me to read!$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 1/pause 500/
                speak Jas "What about chapter books is hard? I might be able to help.$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 3/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "There are so many words, it makes my head hurt and the words are harder to read.$2#$b#It's also really hard to imagine what I'm reading.$3"/pause 500/
                speak Jas "How is Miss Penny helping you with reading?"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "She wants me to read more books. She says that'll make reading easier, but it's so hard!$2"/pause 500/
                speak Jas "What if I helped you with reading some chapter books that I have? I've read them a lot of times, so I think I can help really good.$1"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "... I guess it depends on what the books are about."/pause 500/
                speak Jas "The book I'm reading right now is from a series called The Treehouse of Magic. It's about kids that go on crazy adventures!$1#$b#One time, they went to see actual dinosaurs!"/pause 500/jump Vincent 8/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "Dinosaurs? That sounds like a great book! I think I'll try it."/pause 500/
                speak Jas "Let's go to my house and I can let you choose which books you want to borrow. They're still my books, though.$4"/pause 500/
                speak Vincent "Okay! That sounds like fun!$1"/pause 500/emote Vincent 32 true/emote Jas 32/pause 500/
                end

Changes.LogName: Blank Load for Blacksmith Event Location

Entries.{{ModId}}_LetterDraft/Friendship Clint 5:
jaunty/4 6/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Clint 2 6 3/skippable/pause 1500/
                --Start/
                emote Clint 28 true/shake Clint 1500/pause 2000/
                speak Clint "Keep it together. It's just a letter...$4#$b#But it's so hard to come up with the words.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 500/emote Clint 12/pause 300/
                speak Clint "I can't just say 'I love you' right away. Th-that's so bold. I don't think I could do that.$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 500/emote Clint 40/pause 300/
                speak Clint "People always say to speak from the heart so... Maybe that'll work."/pause 500/emote Clint 40/pause 500/
                speak Clint "Dear Emily...#$b#Wait, am I coming on too strong?$4"/pause 500/
                speak Clint "To Emily... That sounds better."/pause 500/shake Clint 1500/pause 500/
                speak Clint "But what if that's too informal?$2"/
                speak Clint "Who am I kidding, there's no way she likes me back.$2#$b#I doubt a love letter would change the way she feels about me, either.$2"/pause 500/move Clint 4 0 0/move Clint 0 -1 1/move Clint 2 0 0/move Clint 0 -1 1/move Clint 1 0 2/pause 500/
                speak Clint "I wonder if I'll ever get the courage to tell her how I feel about her...$2"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 500/
                end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Advice/Friendship Penny 1000 S:
jaunty/72 70/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Pam 73 69 2 Shane 71 69 2 Penny -999 -1000 2/skippable/pause 5000/
                --Start/
                speak Pam "You should've seen Penny when she was a kid. She was a lot like what I see from Jas, but more shy.$1"/pause 500/
                speak Shane "I'm not too surprised. Penny keeps to herself a lot when she's not helping with Jas and Vincent."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/
                speak Shane "I've been wondering... What was it like raising Penny by yourself?"/pause 500/
                speak Pam "... Why do you ask?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/showFrame Shane 19/pause 500/
                speak Shane "It's just... We have a similar... problem.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Pam "... You're not wrong. We do share the same problem.$2#$b#The only difference is that you started yours at a younger age than myself.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Shane "See, you get what I mean.#$b#For me, it's definitely gotten really bad... And I'm pretty sure it's hurting Jas.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Pam "... I see...$2#$b#I'm just a big screw-up of a mother, so I don't think I have any advice that's worth listening to.$2"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 0/pause 500/
                speak Shane "Well... What would you have done differently if you had the chance?"/pause 500/
                speak Pam "...$2#$b#I would try to ease up on my drinking.#$b#That's easier said than done, though. I've tried quitting a handful of times, but I always went back to the booze.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 2/pause 500/
                speak Pam "I think you still have a chance to make a change for the better, though. You have nothing but time.#$b#My Penny is all grown up, it's impossible for me to make up for all I've done.$2"/pause 500/
                speak Shane "I don't think that's true. Penny still lives with you.#$b#Maybe if you keep trying... She might be able to forgive you?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Pam 3/pause 500/
                speak Pam "You kids are so optimistic compared to me.#$b#It's just so intimidating to try again after all the times I've failed.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/
                speak Shane "If you have hope for me, then I can have hope for you, too.$6"/pause 1000/
                speak Pam "... Thanks for believing in me, kid."/pause 1000/
                warp Penny 72 69/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 500/
                speak Penny "Oh, good morning Shane."/pause 500/
                speak Shane "Good morning, Penny."/pause 500/
                speak Pam "Take care out there, kiddo."/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 500/
                speak Penny "Thanks, I love you Mom.$1"/pause 500/
                speak Pam "I love you too, kid."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2 true/faceDirection Pam 2 true/move Penny 0 2 3/move Penny -5 0 3/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Pam 3 true/move Penny -5 0 3/
                end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Memories/Friendship Jas 750/We:
jaunty/47 89/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Jas 47 94 0/skippable/pause 500/
                --Start/move Jas 0 -5 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Jas 1/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/pause 500/emote Jas 40 true/faceDirection Jas 2/pause 1500/
                speak Jas "...$3#$b#I wish my parents could've been put here...$2"/pause 500/shake Jas 1000/pause 1500/
                speak Jas "I miss them... I miss them so much...$2"/pause 500/move Jas -2 0 3/pause 500/
                speak Jas "When I get older, I'm going to visit your graves...$2"/pause 500/move Jas 4 0 1/pause 500/
                speak Jas "And I'll bring Uncle Shane with me. That way we can visit and say hi.$2"/pause 500/move Jas -2 0 2/pause 500/
                speak Jas "Mommy... Daddy...$2"/pause 500/shake Jas 1000/pause 1500/
                speak Jas "I hope you're having a good time in heaven... But why did you leave me behind?$2"/pause 500/shake Jas 1000/pause 1500/emote Jas 40/pause 1000/move Jas 0 5 2/
                end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Bonds/Friendship Penny 1750 Sa:
jaunty/11 14/farmer -1000 -1000 2 Penny 11 12 3 Sam 17 12 3/skippable/pause 500/
                --Start/
                move Sam -4 0 3/pause 500/
                speak Penny "I hope I don't get too much sand in my shoes.$3#$b#I'd hate to track it inside the house.$2"/pause 500/emote Penny 40/pause 500/jump Sam 4/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 500/jump Penny 4/pause 500/
                speak Penny "Oh, Sam, good afternoon!"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Hey, what's up Penny? How's your mom doing?"/pause 500/
                speak Penny "I'm doing well today.#$b#My mother is... her usual self.$3"/faceDirection Penny 3 true/move Sam 0 -2 3/move Sam -2 0 3/pause 1500/
                speak Penny "What brings you to the beach today?"/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "Sometimes, you just need to listen to the ocean to get your mind off of things.$1"/pause 3000/
                speak Sam "You know, I've been worried about Vincent lately.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/
                speak Penny "Worried? What for?"/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "It's just that he's having a hard time with how our dad has been gone for so long.$2#$b#He's just a kid. He shouldn't have to worry about his parent fighting in a war.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 500/
                speak Penny "I can see how that would effect your mood.$2#$b#Has he been saying or doing anything concerning?$3"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Well, he's been asking more often about when Dad's coming home.$2#$b#The problem is, we don't know when he can come back home yet.$7"/pause 500/
                emote Sam 40/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "Then there's the possibility that he could di-$2"/
                speak Penny "Don't talk like that. I'm sure your father will be alive and well.$5#$b#You need to have more hope in your heart.$3"/pause 500/emote Sam 28/pause 1000/
                speak Sam "... I guess you're right.$8#$b#It's just hard being optimistic when he's been gone for so long.$2"/pause 1500/
                speak Penny "... I understand.$2#$b#Your family's situation must be really hard for a child his age to try to process.$2"/pause 2000/
                speak Penny "Does he have anyone else to talk about this with?"/pause 500/
                speak Sam "We're supposed to be going out of town to visit our grandma this weekend.#$b#She also was the kid of a soldier when she was Vincent's age."/pause 1500/
                speak Sam "Maybe she can tell him some stories or give some advice that could help him out."/pause 2000/
                speak Penny "How much does your family tell Vincent about what's happening with your father?$3"/pause 1000/
                speak Sam "We tell him that our dad is a soldier fighting for the country, kinda like a superhero.#$b#If Dad gets an injury, we tell him about it, but we always tell him he's gonna get better soon.#$b#We don't want him worrying too much.$2"/pause 2000/
                speak Penny "... I wonder if lying is really the best way to tell him things.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 2 true/jump Sam 8/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Is it lying? I thought it was more just twisting the truth. It spares his feelings, you know?$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 0/pause 500/
                speak Penny "I feel like that's the same thing...$3#$b#But I'm not here to split hairs."/pause 500/
                speak Sam "Even if it was lying... would it be so bad if everything ends up okay in the end?"/pause 2000/
                speak Penny "I think that's something you need to figure out on your own."/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 1000/
                speak Penny "It must be hard to be Vincent."/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/
                speak Sam "Your dad has been out of the picture for a long time... Do you think that's similar?$2"/pause 1000/
                speak Penny "... Maybe? I don't think it's comparable at least.$3#$b#My father never intended on coming back home...$2#$b#Your father wants to come home, though. I know it."/pause 2000/
                speak Sam "I believe he wants to come home, too.#$b#I just hope he comes home sooner rather than later. I don't want Vincent asking difficult questions.$2"/pause 2000/
                speak Penny "I'm sure Vincent will be just fine. Just keep an eye on him.$1"/pause 2000/
                speak Sam "Thanks for being a great friend, Penny.$1"/pause 500/
                end
